co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon

Interface NfcTranceiver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IsoTagWrapper

    public interface NfcTranceiver
    Interface for sending and receiving APDU commands to a card. Abstracts Android specific NFC reader stuff away into this generic interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] transceive(byte[] commandApdu)
      Sends a command APDU to the NFC card and returns the received response APDU

    • Method Detail

      • transceive

        byte[] transceive(byte[] commandApdu)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a command APDU to the NFC card and returns the received response APDU
        Parameters:
        commandApdu - command APDU to send
        Returns:
        bytes reveived as response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of communication errors
